member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE
member.summary: Specifies possible values for luma transform block sizes for HEVC.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE_4x4
member.summary: Indicates a luma transform block of pixel size 4.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE_8x8
member.summary: Indicates a luma transform block of pixel size 8.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE_16x16
member.summary: Indicates a luma transform block of pixel size 16.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_TUSIZE_32x32
member.summary: Indicates a luma transform block of pixel size 32.
